articles.title: Bangladesh rest all-rounder Shakib for South Africa tour
articles.description: Bangladesh on Wednesday said they will rest all-rounder Shakib Al Hasan from all cricket until April 30 after the star player sought to withdraw from the upcoming tour of South Africa.
